text: Shiori Fujiwara (born 3 August 1990), also known by her stage name Chiemi Blouson, is a Japanese comedian formerly represented by Watanabe Entertainment. ==Biography== ===2020 hiatus=== On 18 March 2020, Fujiwara suddenly announced that she would be leaving Watanabe Entertainment and dropping her "Chiemi Blouson" stage name, citing a "private matter."[https://aramajapan.com/news/blouson-chiemi-leaves-her-agency-changes- stage-name-postpones-studying-abroad/104986/ Blouson Chiemi leaves her agency, changes stage name, & postpones studying abroad], Arama Japan, 31 March 2020. Retrieved 22 May 2020 In subsequent interviews, she expressed a desire to study abroad in Italy and make a series of YouTube videos about her experiences.“I Have To Be Myself”: Why Comedian Shiori Fujiwara is Dropping her Stage Name and Swapping Japan for Italy, Cezary Jan Strusiewicz, Tokyo Weekender, April 2020. Retrieved 22 May 2020. ==Filmography== ===Television=== ====Entertainment shows==== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Network !
